title: 061 - Who Drinks A Bag Of Milk?
description: On today's show, the guys continue to discuss the possibility that everything may in fact be cake, and Tony is absolutely sick of it. Connor also gets a little redemption as he finds out that maybe his phone isn't the oldest one available on the market after all, plus they dive into the Pod FOD that includes some Netflix suggestions, someone who actually went through and rated the people in the PMI office on the Madden scale, Tony has an interesting connection between the Mormon church and seagulls, Connor potentially appropriating Italian culture in a video much to the chagrin of Nick and Tony, plus the guys find out that several people actually did drink bags of milk growing up, the boys discuss whether or not to form the Bronco gang after Bill already preordered one, plus answer the age old question: is Aldi pretty much for poors? Don't forget to send in your questions to @ThePodPMI on Instagram and Twitter. We appreciate you'se guys for listening. Enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
